column4: This is going to be a fun day, its 7am and I am upgrading from dapper to gutsy. :-D
sure you don't want to wait for hardy?
I'd imagine they'll make that upgrade (lts to lts) easier
nah - this in on my dedicated test box.
on my actual server I hope they do that.
I did it a few days ago, wasn't too bad actually
Well, I don't have phyiscal access to this box - plus no internet-accessable reboots
I'd also suggest starting an extra sshd on a different port, and keep a root prompt open on that
that way you don't get killed when the pam update restarted /etc/init.d/gdm
oh, and make sure you run it from a screen session
apt-get doesn't like it when the session disappears because of a dropped connection :)
good idea. though it still needs to reboot.
yes, but if you lose your connection during the upgrade, you're screwed :)
